articles.title: Canadian rugby men finish a season-best fourth at HSBC France Sevens
articles.description: TOULOUSE, France — Canada ran into a buzz saw in Argentina and lost to France but still finished fourth at the HSBC Sevens on Sunday, its best finish on the HSBC World Rugby Sevens Series this season.
articles.content:
TOULOUSE, France — Canada ran into a buzz saw in Argentina and lost to France but still finished fourth at the HSBC Sevens on Sunday, its best finish on the HSBC World Rugby Sevens Series this season.

articles.title: Argentina plans new rate hike, more FX intervention as inflation soars
articles.description: Argentina's government announced a package of measures to rein in soaring inflation and support the wobbly peso currency on Sunday, including rate adjustments, more interventions in the exchange market and expedited deals with creditors.
articles.content:
[1/2] A one thousand Argentine peso bill sits on top of several one hundred U.S. dollar bills in this illustration picture taken October 17, 2022. REUTERS/Agustin Marcarian/Illustration/File Photo

articles.title: Mauricio Pochettino wants Argentine trio at Chelsea along with Arsenal target Declan Rice
articles.description: Mauricio Pochettino will target four big-name stars at Chelsea this summer, including three of Argentina World Cup winners.Pochettino is set to immine
articles.content:
Mauricio Pochettino will target four big-name stars at Chelsea this summer, including three of Argentina World Cup winners.
Pochettino is set to imminently be unveiled as new Blues boss after agreeing the make up of his backroom staff.
